text: 1. Let a man meditate on the fivefold Sâman, which is greater than great, as the prâ n as (senses). The hiṅkâra is smell 1 (nose), the prastâva speech (tongue), the udgîtha sight (eye), the pratihâra hearing (ear), the nidhana mind. These are one greater than the other.
